metadata.title: THE DAWN OF LIFE PROJECTS
metadata.description: The exhibition 'THE DAWN OF LIFE PROJECTS' by the 4th-year students of Professor Hironori Iwasaki's Creative Innovation Department at Musashino Art University showcases part of the graduation project process that we, the 4th-year students in Iwasaki Seminar, are working on in preparation for graduation.

header.title: THE DAWN OF LIFE PROJECTS
header.description:
Musashino Art University Creative Innovation Department
Professor Hironori Iwasaki's Laboratory 4th-Year Students Seminar Exhibition
header.description-wrap:
Musashino Art University College of Creative Thinking for Social Innovation
Department of Creative Innovation
Professor Hironori Iwasaki's Laboratory
4th-Year Students Seminar Exhibition

section-about.backquote:
Because each of our journeys has been different, there are colors that only you can bring forth. Even if it's an activity that already exists in society, it will naturally take on different hues due to the local context in which it's practiced and your unique character as the practitioner.

Starting from 'me', the individual colors of each person remain independent while gently overlapping. Instead of saying 'You're troubled by this, you're totally different from me', it's about feeling a connection somewhere, resonating, and being able to join hands even as we move towards different things.
section-about.aboutmessage: In 'THE DAWN OF LIFE PROJECTS', we, the 4th-year students of Iwasaki Seminar, will showcase part of the graduation project process we are working on in preparation for graduation.

section-detial.calendar-event:

Feel free to join.
